title: Not able to rejoin after DC
body:
I DC during a ranked game just now
when I relogin, there's no button for me to reconnect 
but it didnt show "Lost" in my match history as it would if i left and they surrendered..

so the game shd be ongoing

What's going on.

Is there anything to fix it? 

PS I've been dc-ing in the past ranked games, but fine in my normals. same internet. anyone having the same problem?

replies.body: That game most likely crashed server side, so everyone would have been booted just like you were. When this happens, you won't get any penalties and it will look like the game just never existed to begin with. You should have been able to requeue immediately after though!
